hero.urgencyText: December slots filling fast - book now
hero.imageAlt: Professional tattoo artist working on custom design

portfolio.subtitle: Every piece tells a story. See our latest custom creations.

sessions.subtitle: Professional service tailored to your vision

testimonials.quote: Jake's attention to detail is incredible. My sleeve turned out better than I ever imagined. The whole experience was professional and comfortable.
testimonials.author: Sarah Chen

testimonials.quote: Best tattoo studio in Manchester hands down. Clean, professional, and Jake really listens to what you want. My geometric piece is absolutely perfect.
testimonials.author: Marcus Williams

paragraphs: With over 8 years of experience in the tattoo industry, Jake has established Manchester Tattoo Company as one of the city's most respected studios. His passion for creating unique, meaningful artwork has led to over 1,500 satisfied clients.

Jake specializes in custom designs that tell your story. Whether it's your first tattoo or you're adding to an existing collection, he takes the time to understand your vision and brings it to life with precision and artistry.
about.callout: Every tattoo should be as unique as the person wearing it.

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We recommend booking 2-4 weeks in advance, especially for larger pieces. Consultations can usually be scheduled within a week.

items.question: What's included in the aftercare?
items.answer: All sessions include detailed aftercare instructions, healing cream, and follow-up support. We're available for any questions during the healing process.

finalCta.headline: Ready to Start Your Tattoo Journey?
finalCta.subheadline: Book your consultation today and let's create something amazing together.

booking.modalDescription: Tell us about your tattoo idea and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to schedule your appointment.
booking.successMessage: Thanks for your interest! We'll contact you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment and discuss your tattoo design.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit will be required to secure your appointment
